column4: is there some anti virus or similar to scan non repository debs?
not really - you can run AV locally and scan after a download - I would say don't use a repo you don't trust
, so if i download a .deb and then scan it there wont be a problem?
1) I wouldn't be concerned about viruses, per se 2) do you have a reason to suspect that the deb is (or contains) malware?
